event: Christine is born!
Jeremy is born!
Christine starts homeschool and Jeremy starts Maranatha Christian school
Christine starts cheerleading
Jeremy performs in his first musical
Jeremy begins writing the musical "Rhythm City"
Jeremy directs and choreographs his first musical "Schoolhouse Rock Live!"
Christine and Jeremy meet online!
Jeremy starts work as a server at Red Rock Canyon Grill
Christine and Jeremy get married!
Christine and Jeremy honeymoon in Florida for a week and a cruise to Caribbean
Jeremy learns to play chess
Christine and Jeremy go on a mission trip to Mexico with SoulTeam Missions
Christine starts work at Applebee's
Christine lands a job as a server at Red Rock Canyon Grill (with Jeremy)
Christine and Jeremy move into their first apartment in Wichita: Cross Creek Apartments
Christine begins coaching cheerleaders for Word of Life School
Christine begins teaching piano lessons
Jeremy graduates from Wichita State University with a BFA degree in Musical Theater
Jeremy and Christine produce/direct/perform in Jeremy's Senior Concert at WSU
Jeremy and Christine move to Minnesota to begin a 47-week tour as directors for Prairie Fire Children's Theater
Jeremy and Christine take a snowboarding trip to Colorado
Christine begins writing accompaniment for "Rhythm City"
Jeremy and Christine leave Praire Fire Children's Theater and move to Shawnee, KS
Jeremy starts working at Cities Unlimited as Director of Marketing
Angel is born!
Jeremy learns to write HTML and program in PHP
Jeremy and Christine perform together in West Side Story at The Theatre in the Park
Angel crawls to cell phones
Jeremy, Christine, and sister Mindy direct, music direct, and choreograph "Honk! Jr." for Indian Woods M.S.
Tony is born!
Jeremy and Christine open life insurance policies
Jeremy, Christine, and sister Mindy direct, music direct, and choreograph The Jungle Book" for CYT
Jeremy begins teaching chess classes and coaching competitive chess students
Jeremy is promoted to CEO of Cities Unlimited
Angel has her first snow day
Tony inspires the renaming of KFC to "Badguy's Chicken"
Angel dresses as Dorothy for Halloween
Jeremy and Christine go on a cruise to Western Caribbean (again)
Jeremy studies fight choreography and performs in an all-fighting stunt show
The family moves to a new house
Tony proves to be a master foam swordsman
Jeremy begins working as a landlord renting out the old home (mistake)
Angel begins dance classes at Miller-Marley
Harmony is born!
Jeremy begins working at American Income Life Insurance (mistake)
Angel has her first dance recital at Miller-Marley
Jeremy quits working at American Income Life
Jeremy begins freelancing as a web developer
Jeremy begins participating in multiple clinical research studies
Jeremy quits coaching chess
Charity is born!
Angel has her first supporting role as Young Cosette in Les Miserables
"Rhythm City" makes its world premiere performance!
Harmony learns to use/break the microwave and sets a juice bottle on fire
Angel begins homeschool
Jeremy and Christine create "Rhythm City Junior" to market to middle schools
Jeremy creates a new production company: Immeasurable Productions
Tony begins homeschool
Immeasurable Productions performs and films "Rhythm City Junior"
"Rhythm City" is performed by multiple schools around the country
Christine begins teaching piano lessons at Blues to Bach
Tony takes gymnastics classes
Chase is born!
Tony takes Karate classes
Christine, Jeremy, and Chase are flown out to Oregon to be guests of honor at the west coast premiere of Rhythm City
Immeasurable Productions performs "Footloose"
Jeremy begins work as a full-time software engineer contractor at Solidify Software
Tony and Angel learn to ride bikes
Angel earns her first computer (by learning to write HTML, CSS, use email, Photoshop, MS Word, Excel, write programs in Scratch, create her own website, and type 30wpm)
Charity builds a giant Keva blocks structure
Angel and Tony participate in their first chess tournament
Jeremy creates "Bad Bats" video game
Jeremy is hired on as a full-time employee at Solidify
Immeasurable Productions performs "Bye Bye Birdie"
Harmony learns to whistle (and invents the wildly popular new game "Whistle Zombie Grave")
Chase becomes the #1 contributor to the high playcount of Youtube's "The Balloon Song"
Angel begins her first year of public school (in 4th grade)
Jeremy begins work as a software engineer for Walsworth Publishing Company
Christine visits twin brother John in Canada
Charity discovers Pikmin on the Wii U (and asks to play it every day)
Mike comes to stay in the basement
Angel plays Molly in CYT's musical "Annie"
Jeremy starts the first chess club at Broken Arrow Elementary (Angel and Tony join)
Harmony takes a trip with Mimi and Grandpa to Iowa (this is a HUGE deal to her)
Tony starts the Legend of Zelda game series
Chase gets a Spider-man four-wheeler and drives all over the house
Christine's grandmother Maxine Farthing ("Gramma Gigi") passes away
Immeasurable Productions performs "42nd Street"
Chase becomes the scissor bandit and opens random food packages with scissors
Christine builds a stage in Harmony and Charity's room
Angel chooses to come back to homeschool
Tony begins public school
Harmony participates in her first chess tournament (and wins a TROPHY!... for last place)
